original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ pajahissatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam parijānāti saḥ samudaya saccam pajahissati iti no

original: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ pajahissati so dukkhasaccaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana samudaya saccam pajahissati saḥ dukkha saccam parijānāti iti no

original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam na parijānāti saḥ samudaya saccam na ppajahissati iti

original: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānanti, no ca samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissanti.
analyzed: ye maggam paṭilabhissanti te dukkha saccam na parijānanti no ca samudaya saccam na ppajahissanti

original: Arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti
analyzed: arahā ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te dukkha saccam ca na parijānanti

original: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissati so dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana samudaya saccam na pajahissati so dukkha saccam na parijānāti iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī samudaya saccam na ppajahissati no ca dukkha saccam na parijānāti

original: Arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti
analyzed: arahā ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te samudaya saccam ca na ppajahissanti
